title: Music genres preferred by consumers in the U.S. 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 56.8 is found at Response Rock and the minimum is found at Other where Response is 9.3.
There is a difference of 47.5 between the maximum Response Rock and minimum Response Other.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Rock and lowest at Response Other.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 56.8 is found at Response Rock and the minimum is found at Other where Response is 9.3.
There is a difference of 47.5 between the maximum Response Rock and minimum Response Other.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Rock and lowest at Response Other.
The second highest Share of respondents is appeared to be the Response Pop.
The Share of respondents of Response Other is 6.11% smaller than the maximum value at Rock.
Share of respondents at Response Rock is 56.8 , second place is Pop at 56.1, and thirdly is Country at 49.9.
Considered together, the average Share of respondents in all 15 Responses is roughly 27.83.
